creator: Klover Holdings
descriptionHtml:
THE PRODUCT

Never run short on cash.
No credit check.
No lines.
No paperwork.
No stress.
The end of overdraft.

Klover is the first platform to give you access to your wages early: innovative tools to help you stay financially stable and protect you from expensive loans, predatory payday lending, and overdraft fees. Sign-up is simple and does not require complicated paperwork or credit checks.

OUR MISSION

Your data, your benefit.

We’re systematically leveling the playing field by giving low cost access to modern financial services. How do we do it? We unlock these products and services by transparently leveraging a valuable asset, your permissioned data. Our customers get it and have already saved hundreds of dollars a year.


HOW KLOVER WORKS

1. Sign up in seconds
Simply tell us a little about you, link your bank account, and verify your paycheck. We will never check your credit.

2. Data opt-in
Your data is your asset. Opt-in to our Truth in Data agreement, and begin using Klover's suite of financial products.

3. Fast access to cash and tools
Your account gives you tools to improve your financial wellness and access cash whenever you need it. No questions asked.


TESTIMONIALS

“The entire process start to finish was incredibly easy and straightforward. It also only took a few minutes to fill everything out. They’re up front about everything and are really quick to respond if you have any questions. A great service!”

Mitch M.
Columbus, Ohio

"On one occasion I needed to get my dad a ride in the middle of the night. I had just paid bills, so I didn’t have the money. Well Klover came through with an instant boost and he made it to the hospital. It turned out to be something minor, but what a relief. Thank you Klover!"

Will L.
Oakland, California


SECURITY

Klover uses the highest bank-level standards for encrypting all of your information. We never share your personal data.


OTHER FEATURES

Klover Personal Financial Management Hub

- Track your monthly spending by category
- Analyze your cashflow with our "money in - money out" tool

Receipt Rewards

- Upload your receipts for cash


CONTACT US

Please reach out to info@joinklover.com with any questions or concerns.

Klover is not affiliated with Dave, Earnin, MoneyLion, Brigit, Albert, Cleo, Branch, Even, Cash App.

descriptionShort: The end of Overdraft. No Credit Check. No Interest. Don't wait for payday.
title: Klover: $100 between paychecks; Cash Advance

creator: Klover Holdings
descriptionHtml:
Get paid your paycheck when you really need it with Klover, the app that gives you the financial freedom to request your paychecks in advance. Whether you need money a little earlier to cover you or you’re worried about meeting a certain payment deadline, we’re here to help you get on top of your finances with a cash advance.

Don’t wait until payday to help manage your finances - Why you’ll love using Klover to get your paychecks earlier:

• Never run short with a cash advance.
• No credit check.
• No lines.
• No paperwork.
• No stress about interest or debt.
• This is the end of overdraft.

Request paychecks and enjoy an early payday with our innovative tools to help you stay financially stable. We’ll give you your cash advance when you need it so you don’t need to stress about meeting a payment deadline or any other financial issues. Plus, we’ll protect you from credit card debt, predatory payday lending, and overdraft fees. Signing up is simple and does not require complicated paperwork or credit checks.

We’re systematically leveling the playing field by giving low-cost access to modern financial services. How do we do it? We unlock these products and services by transparently leveraging a valuable asset, your permissioned data. Our customers get it and have already saved hundreds of dollars a year by using Klover to help with their everyday finances.

You don’t need to wait for payday, especially if you’re trying to meet a strict payment deadline. Get paid your paycheck when you want without having to worry about interest rates or going into your overdraft.

GET AN EARLY PAYDAY AND ENJOY YOUR CASH ADVANCE - HOW KLOVER WORKS IN 3 EASY STEPS

1. Sign up in seconds - Simply tell us a little about you, link your bank account, and verify your paycheck. We will never check your credit.
2. Data opt-in - Your data is your asset. Opt-in to our Truth in Data agreement, and begin using Klover's suite of financial products.
3. Fast access to cash and tools - Your account gives you tools to improve your finances and access cash whenever you need it. No questions asked.

It’s as simple as that. From wanting to hit a payment deadline to simply getting your finances organized, download Klover today to request your paychecks when you need them without dipping into your overdraft.

TESTIMONIALS

“The entire process start to finish was incredibly easy and straightforward. It also only took a few minutes to fill everything out. They’re up front about everything and are really quick to respond if you have any questions. A great service!”

Mitch M.
Columbus, Ohio

"On one occasion I needed to get my dad a ride in the middle of the night. I had just paid bills, so I didn’t have the money. Well Klover came through with an instant boost and he made it to the hospital. It turned out to be something minor, but what a relief. Thank you Klover!"

Will L.
Oakland, California

SECURITY
Klover uses the highest bank-level standards for encrypting all of your information. We never share your personal data.

TRACK PAYMENT & OTHER FEATURES
Klover Personal Financial Management Hub
- Track your monthly spending by category
- Analyze your cashflow with our "money in - money out" tool

Receipt Rewards
- Upload your receipts for cash

CONTACT US
Please reach out to info@joinklover.com with any questions or concerns.

Klover is not affiliated with Dave, Earnin, MoneyLion, Brigit, Albert, Cleo, Branch, Even, Cash App.

descriptionHtml:
Klover: $130 between paychecks; Cash Advance

The end of Overdraft. No Credit Check. No Interest. Don't wait for payday.

THE PRODUCT

Never run short on cash.
No credit check.
No lines.
No paperwork.
No stress.
The end of overdraft.

Klover is the first platform to give you access to your wages early: innovative tools to help you stay financially stable and protect you from expensive loans, predatory payday lending, and overdraft fees. Sign-up is simple and does not require complicated paperwork or credit checks.

OUR MISSION

Your data, your benefit.

We’re systematically leveling the playing field by giving low cost access to modern financial services. How do we do it? We unlock these products and services by transparently leveraging a valuable asset, your permissioned data. Our customers get it and have already saved hundreds of dollars a year.

descriptionShort: Request your $150 cash advance & enjoy an early payday with no interest
title: Klover: Instant Payday Cash Advance

creator: Klover Holdings
descriptionHtml:
Klover: $150 between paychecks; Instant Cash Advance

Don't wait for a pricey money loan, get a no-interest, instant cash advance today!

The end of Overdraft. No Credit Check. No Interest.

“Very easy to use! Was in desperate need of quick cash and Klover was the best app to get it fast.”
-User 8888onyx

“Fast, Easy $100 to my bank account in under 5 min! Best App of All Time!”
- User Bluestaller

More testimonials below…

**THE PRODUCT**

Simply, sign up to borrow money instantly (same day if you want, it’s YOUR money)

ZERO interest (yes, you read that right)
No credit check.
No overdraft, late fees, or hidden fees.

Stop asking friends and family to loan money.
Stop waiting in long lines, filling out stacks of paper, and dealing with stress
Stop getting high interest “installment loans” from payday money lending companies that don’t care about you.

Just use Klover and never run short on cash before Pay day again.

Klover is the first platform to advance cash from your wages early.

Aside from speedy cash, Klover also offers innovative budgeting tools to help you stay financially stable and prevent you from having to borrow cash with predatory payday loans. Cash advance apps like Float Me or Possible have excess fees and hidden expenses -- Klover doesn’t.


Sign-up is as simple as downloading the app and logging in. No complicated paperwork or credit checks.

**HOW KLOVER WORKS**

1. Sign up in seconds
Simply tell us a little about yourself, link your bank account, and verify your paycheck. We will never check your credit.

2. Data opt-in
Your data is your asset. Opt-in to our Truth in Data agreement, and begin using Klover's suite of financial products.

3. Fast access to cash and tools
Whether you are taking a no-interest, payday advance or checking your budget, Klover has your back. Your account gives you tools to improve your financial wellness and access to cash whenever you need it. No questions asked.


**TESTIMONIALS**

“The entire process start to finish was incredibly easy and straightforward. It also only took a few minutes to fill everything out. They’re up front about everything and are really quick to respond if you have any questions. A great service!”

Mitch M

"On one occasion I needed to get my dad a ride in the middle of the night. I had just paid bills, so I didn’t have the money. Well Klover came through with an instant boost and he made it to the hospital. It turned out to be something minor, but what a relief. Thank you Klover!"

Will L

**OUR MISSION**

Your data, your benefit.

We’re systematically leveling the instant loan playing field by giving people low cost access to revolutionary, zero-interest personal loans and other modern financial services.

How are we able to offer an advance loan with no interest? We unlock these products and services by transparently leveraging a valuable asset, your permissioned data. Our customers get it and have already saved hundreds of dollars a year.

**SECURITY**

Klover uses Plaid to link your bank account and follows the highest bank-level standards for encrypting all of your information. We never share your personal data.

**OTHER FEATURES**

Earn Points to unlock more cash boosts!

- Save Money
- Check your Spending

- Analyze your cashflow with our "money in - money out" tool

descriptionHtml:
Klover: $150 between paychecks; Instant Cash Advance

Need some extra cash? We’ll spot you. Get a free, instant cash advance today!

**THE PRODUCT**
Simply, sign up to get money instantly (same day if you want, it’s YOUR money)

Stop asking friends and family for money.
Stop waiting in long lines, filling out stacks of paper, and dealing with employees who could care less.
Just use Klover for all your rainy day money needs and never run short on cash before pay day again.

Klover is the first platform to advance cash from your paycheck early.
Aside from speedy cash, Klover also offers innovative budgeting tools to help you stay financially stable and prevent you from having to use risky, expensive services.

Cash advance apps like Float Me or Possible have excess fees and hidden expenses -- Klover doesn’t. Early payday apps like Daily Pay require your employer to sign up for an account -- Klover doesn't.

Sign-up is as simple as downloading the app and logging in. No complicated paperwork or background checks to stop you from getting your payday advance.

**HOW KLOVER WORKS**
1. Sign up in seconds

**OUR MISSION**
Your data, your benefit.
We’ve revolutionized the cash advance playing field by offering a free cash advance alongside other financial services like automated budgeting and saving tools.

How are we able to offer free advances? We transparently leverage your data to save you time and money. All you have to do is complete small tasks like watching ads or filling out surveys to earn higher cash advance limits. Our customers have already saved hundreds of dollars a year!

descriptionShort: Get cash before you're paid. No Interest. No Credit Check. No late fees.
title: Klover: Instant Cash

creator: Klover Holdings
descriptionHtml:
Run out of money before your payday? Tired of asking friends and family to give you money? No longer do you have to wait till payday to get cash! Tap into money you’ve already earned with Klover’s app to and instantly access your money for free.

There's no interest fees, no credit check and there is absolutely no catch.

Need some extra cash? We’ll spot you. Get a free, instant money access today!

By validating employment you can access money you’re already earned whenever you want to. No interest, no late fees, no payback period, no credit checks.

--EASY SIGN UP – FAST ACCESS--
1. Sign up in seconds (about 60)
Simply tell us a little about yourself, link your bank account, and verify your paycheck. We will never check your credit.
2. Data opt-in
Your data is your asset. Opt-in to our Truth in Data agreement and begin using Klover's suite of financial products.
3. Fast access to cash and tools
Whether you are accessing instant cash or checking your budget, Klover has your back to advance your goals. Your account gives you tools to improve your financial wellness and access to cash whenever you need it. No questions asked.

--OUR MISSION--
Your data, your benefit.
We’ve revolutionized the financial playing field by offering instant money alongside other financial services like automated budgeting and saving tools.
How are we able to free money access? We transparently leverage your data to save you time and money. All you have to do is complete small tasks like answering questions to earn higher limits. Our customers have already saved hundreds of dollars a year!

--HEAVY SECURITY--
Klover uses Plaid to link your bank account and follows the highest bank-level standards for encrypting all of your information. We never share your personal data.

--KLOVER+ FINANCIAL TOOLS--
- Track your monthly spending by category
- Analyze your cashflow with our "money in - money out" tool
- Find savings on the products you already buy
- Unlock exclusive discounts from top brands

--ROUND THE CLOCK SUPPORT--
Please reach out to support@klover.app with any questions or concerns.

Klover is not affiliated with Clover, Dave, Daily Pay, Earnin, MoneyLion, Brigit, Albert, Cleo, Branch, Even, Cash App, Possible, or Float me.

descriptionShort: Payday cash advance & Instant cash advance: Borrow money instantly, Get cash now
title: Klover - Instant Cash Advance

creator: Klover Holdings
descriptionHtml:
Your payday can’t come soon enough! That’s where we come in.

You can get a Klover cash advance up to $200 cash – even if your payday is 2 weeks away. And unlike banks, there are no late fees, credit checks or interest charges. Like, legit zero-zero.

HOW TO GET YOUR FIRST ADVANCE:
Enter your name, email and phone to sign up in seconds
Connect your bank so we know where to send your money
Pocket your cash in minutes –– get up to $200

But we’re not just a one-trick pony. Here’s why over 2 million people have made Klover their budget bestie:

SCORE EASY POINTS
Earn points for things like taking surveys and watching ads. You can then cash them out for a bigger advance or to enter our daily sweepstakes.

WIN MONEY ON THE DAILY
You’ve got a chance to win $100 every day. Plus, five people get to pocket $20. That’s over 2000 chances to win each year!

BUDGET LIKE A BOSS
Level up your money game with Klover+ innovative budgeting tools. Create spend goals, opt-in to track your credit score, and earn extra points when you reach savings targets.

MONEY FROM THE FUTURE
It’s not sci-fi, it’s borrowing from yourself. Ditch the banks with high fees or your friends with high horses. Get a cash advance through the Klover app with no credit checks, late fees or interest charges. Legit zero-zero.

_________________________________________________
WHY WE’RE HERE
We’re not your typical financial Institution. Our biggest goal is to see you financially free.

So, we’ll never charge you annoyingly high fees. Instead, we can give you a swiss army knife of money tools, plus immediate cash advances by leveraging your most valuable asset -– your data.

By transparently leveraging your approved data, we can provide low to no fees financial products and services to save you time and money.

YOUR DATA IS SAFE WITH US
Your data is always anonymized (we’ll never know who you are) and securely stored using 256-bit encryption (we’re talking military-grade, bank-level technology here). When you opt-in to our Truth in Data agreement, you’ll unlock all the Klover app perks –– like cash advances, budgeting tools, sweepstakes –– without any credit checks, late fees or interest charges. Nothing. Nada. Zilch.

STAY IN TOUCH
Got a question? Reach out to us at info@joinklover.com

Disclaimer: Klover does not offer loans. We are NOT a payday loan, cash loan, personal loan, or app to borrow money. By validating your employment you can access money you’ve already earned.

You can get a Klover cash advance up to $200 cash – even if your payday is 2 weeks away. And unlike banks, there are no late fees, credit checks or interest charges. Like, legit zero-zero.*

HOW TO GET YOUR FIRST ADVANCE:
Enter your name, email and phone to sign up in seconds
Connect your bank so we know where to send your money
Pocket your cash in minutes –– get up to $200

But we’re not just a one-trick pony. Here’s why over 2 million people have made Klover their budget bestie:

SCORE EASY POINTS**
Earn points for things like taking surveys and watching ads. You can then cash them out for a bigger advance or to enter our daily sweepstakes.

WIN MONEY ON THE DAILY
You’ve got a chance to win $100 every day. Plus, five people get to pocket $20. That’s over 2000 chances to win each year!

BUDGET LIKE A BOSS
Level up your money game with Klover+ innovative budgeting tools. Create spend goals, opt-in to track your credit score, and earn extra points when you reach savings targets.

MONEY FROM THE FUTURE
It’s not sci-fi, it’s borrowing from yourself. Ditch the banks with high fees or your friends with high horses. Get a cash advance through the Klover app with no credit checks, late fees or interest charges. Legit zero-zero.

_________________________________________________
WHY WE’RE HERE
We’re not your typical financial Institution. Our biggest goal is to see you financially free.

So, we’ll never charge you annoyingly high fees. Instead, we can give you a swiss army knife of money tools, plus immediate cash advances by leveraging your most valuable asset -– your data.

By transparently leveraging your approved data, we can provide low to no fees financial products and services to save you time and money.

YOUR DATA IS SAFE WITH US
Your data is always anonymized (we’ll never know who you are) and securely stored using 256-bit encryption (we’re talking military-grade, bank-level technology here). When you opt-in to our Truth in Data agreement, you’ll unlock all the Klover app perks –– like cash advances, budgeting tools, sweepstakes –– without any credit checks, late fees or interest charges. Nothing. Nada. Zilch.

STAY IN TOUCH
Got a question? Reach out to us at info@joinklover.com

*LEGAL DISCLOSURE:
Klover does not offer loans. We are NOT a payday loan, cash loan, or personal loan app, nor an app to borrow money. By validating your employment you can access money you’ve already earned whenever you want to. Klover’s advance service is free and doesn’t have interest. Our APR is 0%. Klover’s advance service does not require a minimum repayment time frame. Klover’s advance service does not require a maximum repayment time frame. For example, if you request an advance of $100 your future repayment is $100. Example 2: If you select a completely optional immediate delivery fee of $8.49 your future repayment would be $108.49. Klover’s advance service is not a contracted obligation to repay a loan. For more information please see Klover’s terms and conditions: https://www.klover.app/terms-and-conditions.

**Points cannot be redeemed for cash, only in-app features
Klover’s Privacy Policy: https://www.klover.app/privacy-policy
